channel.title: Space mission of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the space mission of the day.

item.title: Timeline of Mars Science Laboratory
item.description: The Mars Science Laboratory and its rover, Curiosity, were launched from Earth on 26 November 2011. As of January 10, 2025, Curiosity has been on the planet Mars for 4418 sols (4540 total days; 12 years, 157 days) since landing on 6 August 2012. (See Current status.)
